katrenko.ws
Class CollocationService

java.lang.Object
  katrenko.ws.CollocationService

public class CollocationService
extends java.lang.Object

CollocationService is used to look up the n-grams (collocations) of a given frequency and length. Based on the LingPipe libraries.

Method Detail

find_phrases

public java.lang.String find_phrases(java.lang.String data_train,
                                     java.lang.String data_test,
                                     java.lang.String ngram,
                                     java.lang.String min,
                                     java.lang.String max)
Returns a list of collocations given a path to the folder with the documents (text data, html). Alternatively, can be used to compare information from two different folders. In the latter case, it lists all collocations which are "new" w.r.t. background corpus.

Parameters:
data_train - background corpus (absolute path to the first folder)
data_test - foreground corpus (absolute path to the second folder)
ngram - length of the n-grams
min - minimum count (frequency of n-grams)
max - max number of collocations to be returned
Returns:
list of collocations in XML

    Default values for the parameters are the following:
  • ngram = 2
  • min = 2
  • max = 1000
  • data_test (foreground corpus) is optional and if it is not provided, search for collocations is performed in a background corpus (data_train) only.

If a parameter's value provided by a user is not correct (e.g., as a minimum count are used symbols instead of numbers), it is set to the default value.
